verses.text: And it came to pass on the eighth day , \add that\add* Moses called Aaron and his sons , and the elders of Israel ;
And he said unto Aaron , Take thee a young calf for a sin offering , and a ram for a burnt offering , without blemish , and offer \add them\add* before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And unto the children of Israel thou shalt speak , saying , Take ye a kid of the goats for a sin offering ; and a calf and a lamb , \add both\add* of the first year , without blemish , for a burnt offering ;

Also a bullock and a ram for peace offerings , to sacrifice before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and a meat offering mingled with oil : for to day the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will appear unto you. \p
¶ And they brought \add that\add* which Moses commanded before the tabernacle of the congregation : and all the congregation drew near and stood before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And Moses said , This \add is\add* the thing which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* commanded that ye should do : and the glory of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall appear unto you.

And Moses said unto Aaron , Go unto the altar , and offer thy sin offering , and thy burnt offering , and make an atonement for thyself, and for the people : and offer the offering of the people , and make an atonement for them; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded. \p
¶ Aaron therefore went unto the altar , and slew the calf of the sin offering , which \add was\add* for himself.
And the sons of Aaron brought the blood unto him: and he dipped his finger in the blood , and put \add it\add* upon the horns of the altar , and poured out the blood at the bottom of the altar :
But the fat , and the kidneys , and the caul above the liver of the sin offering , he burnt upon the altar ; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses.
And the flesh and the hide he burnt with fire without the camp.
And he slew the burnt offering ; and Aaron’s sons presented unto him the blood , which he sprinkled round about upon the altar.
And they presented the burnt offering unto him, with the pieces thereof, and the head : and he burnt \add them\add* upon the altar.
And he did wash the inwards and the legs , and burnt \add them\add* upon the burnt offering on the altar. \p
¶ And he brought the people’s offering , and took the goat , which \add was\add* the sin offering for the people , and slew it, and offered it for sin , as the first.
And he brought the burnt offering , and offered it according to the manner.\f + \fr 9.16 \ft manner: or, ordinance\f*

And he brought the meat offering , and took an handful thereof, and burnt \add it\add* upon the altar , beside the burnt sacrifice of the morning.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft took…: Heb. filled his hand out of it\f*

He slew also the bullock and the ram \add for\add* a sacrifice of peace offerings , which \add was\add* for the people : and Aaron’s sons presented unto him the blood , which he sprinkled upon the altar round about ,
And the fat of the bullock and of the ram , the rump , and that which covereth \add the inwards\add*, and the kidneys , and the caul \add above\add* the liver :
And they put the fat upon the breasts , and he burnt the fat upon the altar :
And the breasts and the right shoulder Aaron waved \add for\add* a wave offering before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; as Moses commanded.
And Aaron lifted up his hand toward the people , and blessed them, and came down from offering of the sin offering , and the burnt offering , and peace offerings. \p
And Moses and Aaron went into the tabernacle of the congregation , and came out , and blessed the people : and the glory of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* appeared unto all the people.

And there came a fire out from before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and consumed upon the altar the burnt offering and the fat : \add which\add* when all the people saw , they shouted , and fell on their faces.
